item.title: Someone to make a cocktail video for a liquor brand. - Upwork
item.description:
Of course, here's an even shorter version:

---

**Job Opportunity: Beverage Photographer**

Jinterros Rum is seeking a talented photographer to capture the essence of our premium rum.

**Responsibilities:**
- Photograph products in various settings.
- Create dynamic compositions that highlight our brand.

**Requirements:**
- Experience in beverage/product photography.
- Strong portfolio with high-quality videos.
- Creative and detail-oriented.
- Own equipment and ability to work on-site.

---

Feel free to make any further adjustments!

Budget: $150
Posted On: July 01, 2024 22:52 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Video Commercial
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Video Commercial
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Fashion Social Media Shoot Videographer in Philadelphia - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented and experienced videographer to capture stunning footage for a full day fashion social media shoot on july 16th OR 17th in Philadelphia.

The ideal candidate will have a passion for fashion and a keen eye for detail. As the videographer, you will be responsible for filming and editing high-quality videos that showcase our clothing line and brand. You should have a strong understanding of current fashion trends and be able to translate them into compelling visuals.

    Key Skills:
    - Proficient in operating professional video cameras and equipment
    - Knowledge of lighting techniques and composition
    - Ability to work collaboratively with a creative team
    - Strong organizational and time management skills
    
If you are passionate about fashion and have a keen eye for capturing captivating visuals, we would love to hear from you!

Hourly Range: $32.00-$79.00
Posted On: July 01, 2024 22:49 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Videography, Video Production, Camera, Video Editing
Skills: Videography, Video Production, Camera, Video Editing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: On-Camera Video Task - $70 - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for someone who’s not camera shy to help with a quick video task. No video editing required!

Pay:
$70 for a short video task

Requirements:

Comfortable being on camera
Reliable and punctual

Budget: $70
